report.title: Species & Occurrence Counts by Taxon Group
report.description: Lists taxon groups and the number of species and occurrences within them, grouped by CMS user accounts, i.e. the logged in recorder.
report.query: SELECT cast(sav_cmsid.int_value as varchar) as cms_user_id, count(DISTINCT ttl.taxon_meaning_id) as species_count, count(DISTINCT o.id) as occurrences_count FROM occurrences o JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl ON o.taxa_taxon_list_id = ttl.id AND ttl.deleted=false JOIN samples s on s.id=o.sample_id AND s.deleted=false JOIN sample_attribute_values sav_cmsid ON sav_cmsid.sample_id=s.id AND sav_cmsid.deleted=false JOIN sample_attributes sa_cmsid ON sa_cmsid.id=sav_cmsid.sample_attribute_id AND sa_cmsid.deleted=false AND sa_cmsid.caption='CMS User ID' WHERE o.deleted=false AND o.zero_abundance='f' AND #website_filter# AND (CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) GROUP BY sav_cmsid.int_value UNION SELECT 'total' as cms_user_id, count(DISTINCT ttl.taxon_meaning_id) as species_count, count(DISTINCT o.id) as occurrences_count FROM occurrences o JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl ON o.taxa_taxon_list_id = ttl.id AND ttl.deleted=false JOIN samples s on s.id=o.sample_id AND s.deleted=false JOIN sample_attribute_values sav_cmsid ON sav_cmsid.sample_id=s.id AND sav_cmsid.deleted=false JOIN sample_attributes sa_cmsid ON sa_cmsid.id=sav_cmsid.sample_attribute_id AND sa_cmsid.deleted=false AND sa_cmsid.caption='CMS User ID' WHERE o.deleted=false AND o.zero_abundance='f' AND #website_filter# AND (CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND '#include_total#'!='no'

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys
